inner col col24 first last id49f1a131-e23b-4932-9ec4-30514b2c7109

h2.strong: Message from Town Manager Lisa Wong

div.p: My office is working closely with the Winchester Health Department, the Superintendent’s Office, Public Safety and other key departments, local, regional, state, and federal partners as COVID-19 evolves. Things keep changing and we know that you are all working hard to keep yourself and your loved ones safe. We know information is key to doing that so the town has created this page to post necessary, timely and helpful information. PLEASE SIGN UP HERE FOR WINCHESTER AWARE to receive alerts to your email and phone.

div.class: inner col col24 first last id7152ff30-df5c-4ea4-9d19-8d904eaa0fc0

h2.a: Press Release from Governor Charlie Baker - March 15, 2020

div.p: Massachusetts Governor Charlie Baker gave a Press Conference on Sunday, March 15. Please click on the link above for the full Press Release.

Some of the executive orders the Governor is expected to file tomorrow include:
* Schools (public and private) closed from Tuesday until April 7.
* No on premise eating or drinking at bars or restaurants from Tuesday until April 7.
* No social gatherings over 25 people.
* Ban visitors to nursing homes (may have exceptions for end of life care)
* Banning (beginning Wednesday) hospitals ban non-essential procedures.
* Allow some pharmacists to make their own hand sanitizer to address shortage.
Please keep checking the website for the latest news.
